players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie and not the mafioso who killed Bob? This seems suspicious."
Charlie: "Alice, your story doesn't add up. If you're the detective, why investigate me when Bob was just killed? Sounds like you're trying to deflect suspicion."
Diana: "Alice, if you're truly the detective, why reveal your investigation result so early? This feels like a mafia attempt to mislead us."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. Diana, if you vote with Charlie, you're helping mafia win. Trust me."
Charlie: "Diana, I agree with you. Alice's quick accusation feels off—maybe she's the one we should worry about."
